posts.title: CodeForces-Educational-Round-122-A&B&C
posts.text: A. Div. 7 Detils Solution12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637#include <bits/stdc++.h>#include <string>using namespace std; int main() {#ifndef OI freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin); freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);#endif ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); int t; cin >> t; while (t--) { int a; cin >> a; int tmp = a / 7 * 7; int c = a / 10; int d = tmp / 10; int v = a % 10; if (a % 7 == 0) { cout << a << endl; } else if (c == d) { cout << tmp << endl; } else { for (int i = 1; i <= 10; i++) { int ss = c * 10 + i; if (ss % 7 == 0) { cout << ss << endl; break; } } } } return 0;} B. MinorityDetils Solution12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include <bits/stdc++.h>#include <string>using namespace std;void solve(){ string s; cin >> s; int zero = int(count(s.begin(),s.end(),'0')); int one = int(count(s.begin(),s.end(),'1')); int ans = min(zero,one); ans -= zero ==one; cout << ans << '\n';}int main() { #ifndef OI freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin); freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout); #endif ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); int t; cin >> t; while (t--) { solve(); } return 0;} C. Kill the MonsterDetils Solution12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include <algorithm>#include <bits/stdc++.h>#include <cmath>#include <cstdint>#include <iostream>#include <stdexcept>using namespace std;int64_t ceil_div(int64_t a, int64_t b){ return a / b +((a ^ b) > 0 && a % b != 0);}bool win(int64_t HC, int64_t DC, int64_t HM, int64_t DM){ int64_t our_attacks = ceil_div(HM, DC); int64_t their_attacks = ceil_div(HC, DM); return our_attacks <= their_attacks;}void solve() { int64_t HC, DC, HM, DM, K, W, A; cin >> HC >> DC >> HM >> DM >> K >> W >> A; bool ans = false; for (int64_t w = 0; w <= K; w++) { int64_t a = K - w; ans = ans || win(HC + a * A, DC + w * W, HM, DM); } cout << (ans ? "YES" : "NO") << '\n';}int main() { ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr);#ifndef OI freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin); freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);#endif int n; cin >> n; while (n--) { solve(); } return 0;}
